short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionize online content consumption with AI Summarizer: instant, concise summaries of lengthy articles/webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize any article or webpage

Unlock the power of artificial intelligence with Sumz AI Summarizer Chrome extension! This cutting-edge tool 
revolutionizes the way you consume online content by providing instant, concise summaries of lengthy articles. 
Harnessing advanced natural language processing, our extension identifies key information, extracts vital details, 
and condenses articles into bite-sized summaries without compromising on relevance.

WHY USE SUMZ AND ITS BENEFITS?
- instantly get a summary of any webpage you're reading with a click of a button using AI
- customise your prompt to get your summary the way you want it
- customise the length of your summary to fit your needs
- save you summaries in your localstorage for easy access whenever you wanna look back

HOW CAN I USE SUMZ TO SUMMARIZE ARTICLES AND/OR WEBPAGES?
To start summarising with sumz, all you have to do after installation is click on the extension to open the popup, create 
an account if you don't have on already add your open ai api key to your profile tab, this can be found at https://platform.openai.com,
when you navigate over to open ai platform, on the side bar on your left where the openai logo is at, click on "API keys"
then click on the button "Create new secret key" it will open a popup where you can add a name for the key like "my api key"
then just create you key. After creating your api key copy and paste it over to your profile tab in the extension popup to 
begin summarising. checkout https://sumz.pro/#how-to-use for more details.

Get to know more about sumz on https://sumz.pro
